name: Factory Game Prototype
description:
A Letter For Aldegator...

Dear Aldegator, Hi, your santa here!! 

I'm sorry that i didn't managed to complete the game!! I tried my best to make you this game, with the little knowledge i had, but life got in the way and i felt unmotivated pretty quickly.

I don't usually play, nor like, the type of genre that you wanted, the closes game i played is a mobile game about making a factory called "Assembly Line" (Basically a idle, much simpler, version of Factorio).  So i wanted to make that, but merged with another mobile game i like called "Alchimia" (A game about merging 2 element to make a new one). 

Sadly i only managed to make the basics elements for the game, some conveyor belts, a place to produce resources, a place to combine 2 resources into a new one and a place to see them. I only added 2 recipes into the game, for testing purposes: Lava and Stone. In the future i think I'll add more recipes (Or maybe a system for users to submit custom to add custom resources, idk). I'll doubt i'll add more than that tho :/

Again sorry if the game is barebone and lacks challanges and objectives. I hope you'll like it either way!! And i hope you a happy Merry Christmas!!

With love, your santa. Marxy 37

⠀
